author: tomj
msg: Revert fix for bug 18287 - Error in serialization of xsd:boolean fields
This stopped nillable="true" XML Schema types from getting translated to Java
wrapper types (Integer, etc).  This causes Axis to fail the JAX-RPC test suite.

author: haddadc
msg: updated the README to reflect that the authorization handler references WSDD parameters.  removed perms.lst as it is now longer referenced by the handler.

author: haddadc
msg: updated usage information to match the code
